<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103094</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103094</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207137</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Learning About Immigration through Oral History</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lernen über Immigration durch Mundgeschichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Se renseigner sur l'immigration par l'histoire 
orale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aprendizagem sobre o immigration com o history 
oral</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Imparando circa l'immigrazione con storia orale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκμάθηση για τη μετανάστευση μέσω της προφορικής 
ιστορίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El aprender sobre la inmigración con historia 
oral</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a lesson plan where a team of middle-school students search the Library of Congress website and other resources to learn how to conduct oral history interviews.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist ein Lektionplan, wo ein Team der Mittlerschule
Kursteilnehmer die Bibliothek von Kongreßweb site und von anderen 
Betriebsmitteln suchen, um zu erlernen, wie man Mundgeschichte 
Interviews leitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est un plan de leçon où une équipe d'étudiants
de moyen-école recherchent la bibliothèque du site Web du congrès 
et d'autres ressources pour apprendre comment conduire des entrevues 
orales d'histoire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma planta da lição onde uma equipe de 
estudantes da médio-escola procurara a biblioteca do Web site do 
congress e dos outros recursos para aprender como conduzir entrevistas
orais do history.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un programma di lezione dove una squadra di 
allievi della centrale-scuola cerca la libreria del Web site del 
congresso e di altre risorse per imparare come condurre le interviste 
orali di storia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος όπου μια ομάδα των 
μέσος-σχολικών σπουδαστών ψάχνει τον ιστοχώρο βιβλιοθήκης του 
συνεδρίου και άλλα στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς για να μάθει πώς να 
πραγματοποιήσει τις προφορικές συνεντεύξεις ιστορίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es un plan de la lección donde un equipo de los 
estudiantes de la medio-escuela busca la biblioteca del Web site del 
congreso y de otros recursos para aprender cómo conducir entrevistas 
orales de la historia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207137</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103094</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/learning-about-immigration-through-oral-history</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
